verses.verse: Why are <S%H6256>times<s%> not laid <S%H6845>up<s%> by the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>? And why do not they that <S%H3045>know<s%> him <S%H2372>see<s%> his <S%H3117>days<s%>?
There are that <S%H5381>remove<s%> the <S%H1367>landmarks<s%>; They violently take <S%H1497>away<s%> <S%H5739>flocks<s%>, and feed <S%H7462>them<s%>.
They drive <S%H5090>away<s%> the <S%H2543>ass<s%> of the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>; They <S%H2254>take<s%> the <S%H490>widow<s%>'s <S%H7794>ox<s%> for a <S%H2254>pledge<s%>.
They <S%H5186>turn<s%> the <S%H34>needy<s%> out of the <S%H1870>way<s%>: The <S%H6041>poor<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3162>all<s%> hide <S%H2244>themselves<s%>.

Behold <S%H6501><s%>, as wild asses in the <S%H4057>desert<s%> They go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to their <S%H6467>work<s%>, seeking <S%H7836>diligently<s%> for <S%H2964>food<s%>; The <S%H6160>wilderness<s%> yieldeth them <S%H3899>bread<s%> for their <S%H5288>children<s%>.
They <S%H7114>cut<s%> their <S%H1098>provender<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>; And they <S%H3953>glean<s%> the <S%H3754>vintage<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
They lie all <S%H3885>night<s%> <S%H6174>naked<s%> without <S%H3830>clothing<s%>, And have no <S%H3682>covering<s%> in the <S%H7135>cold<s%>.
They are <S%H7372>wet<s%> with the <S%H2230>showers<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, And <S%H2263>embrace<s%> the <S%H6697>rock<s%> for want of a <S%H4268>shelter<s%>.
There are that <S%H1497>pluck<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> from the <S%H7699>breast<s%>, And take a <S%H2254>pledge<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%>;
So that they <S%H1980>go<s%> about <S%H6174>naked<s%> without <S%H3830>clothing<s%>, And being <S%H7457>hungry<s%> they <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H6016>sheaves<s%>.
They make <S%H6671>oil<s%> <S%H996>within<s%> the <S%H7791>walls<s%> of these <S%H1869>men<s%>; They tread their <S%H3342>winepresses<s%>, and suffer <S%H6770>thirst<s%>.

From out of the populous <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H4962>men<s%> <S%H5008>groan<s%>, And the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H2491>wounded<s%> crieth <S%H7768>out<s%>: Yet <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H7760>regardeth<s%> not the <S%H8604>folly<s%>.
These are of them that <S%H4775>rebel<s%> against the <S%H216>light<s%>; They <S%H5234>know<s%> not the <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H3427>thereof<s%>, Nor abide in the paths <S%H5410>thereof<s%>.

The <S%H7523>murderer<s%> <S%H6965>riseth<s%> with the <S%H216>light<s%>; He <S%H6991>killeth<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H6041>needy<s%>; And in the <S%H3915>night<s%> he is as a <S%H1590>thief<s%>.

The <S%H5869>eye<s%> also of the <S%H5003>adulterer<s%> <S%H8104>waiteth<s%> for the <S%H5399>twilight<s%>, <S%H559>Saying<s%>, No <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall <S%H7789>see<s%> <S%H5643>me<s%>: And he disguiseth his <S%H6440>face<s%>.
In the <S%H2822>dark<s%> they dig <S%H2864>through<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%>: They <S%H2856>shut<s%> themselves up in the <S%H3119>day-time<s%>; They <S%H3045>know<s%> not the <S%H216>light<s%>.
For the <S%H1242>morning<s%> is to all of them <S%H3162>as<s%> thick <S%H6757>darkness<s%>; For they <S%H5234>know<s%> the <S%H1091>terrors<s%> of the thick <S%H6757>darkness<s%>.

Swiftly they pass <S%H7031>away<s%> upon the face of the <S%H6440>waters<s%>; Their <S%H2513>portion<s%> is <S%H7043>cursed<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>: They <S%H6437>turn<s%> not into the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>.
Drought <S%H6723><s%> and <S%H2527>heat<s%> <S%H1497>consume<s%> the <S%H7950>snow<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>: So doth <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> those that have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>.

The <S%H7358>womb<s%> shall <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H7415>him<s%>; The worm shall feed <S%H4988>sweetly<s%> on <S%H2142>him<s%>; He shall be no more remembered; And <S%H5766>unrighteousness<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken<s%> as a <S%H6086>tree<s%>.
He <S%H7462>devoureth<s%> the <S%H6135>barren<s%> that <S%H3205>beareth<s%> <S%H3190>not<s%>, And doeth not good to the <S%H490>widow<s%>.
Yet God <S%H4900>preserveth<s%> the <S%H47>mighty<s%> by his <S%H3581>power<s%>: He riseth <S%H6965>up<s%> that hath no <S%H539>assurance<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>.
God <S%H5414>giveth<s%> them to be in <S%H983>security<s%>, and they <S%H8172>rest<s%> <S%H5869>thereon<s%>; And his eyes are upon their <S%H1870>ways<s%>.

They are <S%H7426>exalted<s%>; yet a little <S%H4592>while<s%>, and they are <S%H4355>gone<s%>; Yea, they are brought low, they are taken <S%H7092>out<s%> of the <S%H1870>way<s%> as all <S%H5243>others<s%>, And are cut off as the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the ears of <S%H7641>grain<s%>.
And if it be not so <S%H645>now<s%>, who will <S%H7760>prove<s%> me a <S%H3576>liar<s%>, And <S%H7760>make<s%> my <S%H4405>speech<s%> nothing <S%H408>worth<s%>?
